author: newsr.in
title: Selena Gomez Opens Up About Having Lupus for 'Billboard' Cover Story
text: Selena Gomez rocks a plunging neckline for the latest Billboard magazine cover. The 23-year-old “Good For You” singer opened up to the glossy about being diagnosed with Lupus, how she deals with the negativity, and more. Check it: On having Lupus: “I was diagnosed with lupus, and I’ve been through chemotherapy. That’s what my break [...] »
